entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h early this evening. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 20.
